attributes.action: Leave the EU without a deal OR remain in the EU on current terms
attributes.additional_details: As evidenced by events in parliament MP’s are following party agendas or personal beliefs. They no longer represent the view of the people. Let the people decide.
attributes.background:
Whilst the MP’s believe they are taking control of Brexit we know they will simply ‘fudge’ the real question.
Clearly a straightforward deal with the EU is not possible. Therefore the people should decide are we in or out.
